caption.p: Protective effect of CVA4 maternal antibodies. The 6-week-old adult females were immunized twice with the inactivated CVA4 vaccine. After delivery, the pups ( n = 10–15) were inoculated with a lethal dose of homologous or heterologous CVA4, CVA6, CVA16 and EVA71 strains on postnatal day 3.
